summary:
The market opportunity for data service and infrastructure providers in the digital asset space
The increase in demand for DeFi data in the last 9 months
How recent efforts in CBDCs and of Libra can spur growth across the industry
The future of M&A activity within the space
Growth projections for crypto funds and how that will impact data providers
How consolidation across exchanges will impact the costs of data
author: The Block
The Block
title: The Block Presents: The State of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Landscape
